name: Quantum Puzzle 2022
description:
A new year, a new update!

Welcome to Quantum Puzzle 2022, let's make some brain cells work!

The puzzle might seem simple, but those fancy orbs make you dizzy, you may feel an overwhelmingly depressing feeling that you can't do it. You may tell yourself that you can do it, maybe start again, or just do something else and take a look with a fresh mind later. And then you fail again. You start to decide to either start a new level or dismiss the game completely. The real question is if you keep going or give up. It's that simple. That's Quantum Puzzle 2022.

So go check it out, wish you some fun!

XOXO

Oleksij Fix
